body:
I'm using FPDF to output data into PDF. To download the PDF automatically, I used

	$pdf->Output("file.pdf", 'D');
	

But I wanted it also to be viewed in the browser at the same time. 
It should be: User enters data and then turns to PDF and at the same time downloads the PDF automatically.
How can I do this?
title: View PDF and download it automatically (FPDF)
